long_description: From your favorite bookstore to campus to work, our Novara Westbrae bike knickers offer casual off-bike style with plenty of on-bike performance and functionality. Fabric offers 4-way stretch along with wind- and water-resistance for on-the-go comfort; fabric draws moisture away from your body. Crotch is reinforced with Schoeller(R) fabric to enhance durability and minimize chafing. Back pockets feature reflective tabs along trim; when off your bike, pull out pocket flaps to cover reflective trim if you wish. Rolling up left cuff exposes reflective trim on the underside; reflective logos also help boost your visibility to motorists. Trim, straight-legged fit features articulation for freedom of movement; higher rise at back of waist offers increased coverage when you're riding. Knickers feature a belt holster that lets you secure your U-lock when you're riding. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: From your favorite bookstore to campus to work, our Novara Westbrae bike knickers offer casual off-bike style with plenty of on-bike performance and functionality.
